overview: "Unpretty" - Beauty is Skin Deep Maggie (Meredith L. Phillips) is an overweight teenage girl who is the center of every joke in school. The constant bullying and torment has caused her psyche to begin to break. Becca (Stephanie Antoinette Marrow), whose antics have caused her to be on the brink of expulsion, is forced by the Principal to become friends with Maggie. Can Becca save Maggie's crumbling mind, or will her new "friend" just help prove that deep down we are all a little unpretty?
title: Unpretty
